Introduction

VIVIZ is a three-member girl group under BPM Entertainment. The group consists of former GFRIEND members SinB, Eunha and Umji. They made their debut on February 9, 2022 with the mini album "Beam of Prism".

Their official fandom name is Na.V, which stands for “New and Vivid”. The group was formed by Eunha, SinB and Umji, who were previously members of GFRIEND, a six-member girl group that disbanded in May 2021.

On October 6, 2021, BPM Entertainment announced that the three members signed a contract with them and would be making their debut again as a new group. On October 8, 2021, the group’s name and logo were revealed. On October 22, 2021, the group’s debut date and single album title were confirmed.
